Title: Roblox Return to Service 10/28-10/31 2021 - Roblox Blog
Description: Starting October 28th and fully resolving on October 31st, Roblox experienced a 73-hour outage. We’re sharing these technical details to give our community an understanding of the root cause of the problem, how we addressed it, and what we are doing to prevent similar issues from happening in the future.
